Sentencas: Bulk samples of SmBa1-xSrxCo2O5+ were synthesized using solid-state chemical reaction of the starting metal oxides in the appropriate weight ratios and heating in air at temperatures approaching 1223K. Their thermal expansion coefficients were determined using in situ x-ray diffraction studies between 298K and 1273K. No phase transition was observed during the heating or the cooling cycle.
Titulo: Thermal Stability and Anisotropic Thermal Expansion of SmBa1-xSrxCo2O5+ (0.1x0.5)

Sentencas: The volumetric thermal expansion coefficients for samples with orthorhombic Pmmm phase are 6x10(-5)K(-1)(x=0.0), 6.8x10(-5)K(-1) (x=0.3) and 6.4x10(-5)K(-1) (x=0.5), and for sample with an orthorhombic phase Pnma 7.1x10(-5)K(-1) (x=1).
Titulo: Thermal Stability and Anisotropic Thermal Expansion of SmBa1-xSrxCo2O5+ (0.1x0.5)

Sentencas: The linear thermal expansion showed anisotropy of (a) or (c)>(b) for samples with Pmmm phase and no anisotropy for the x=1 sample.
Titulo: Thermal Stability and Anisotropic Thermal Expansion of SmBa1-xSrxCo2O5+ (0.1x0.5)
